graphs
Class RadialCluster

java.lang.Object
  graphs.Cluster
      graphs.RadialCluster

public class RadialCluster
extends Cluster

RadialCluster class is an extension of Cluster, where an dummy node is added, called centerNode. Radial Clusters has only edges between the centerNode and the rest of the nodes. The edge complexity is reduced, but the quality of the shape of clusters is worse

Author:
Roberto Therón and Rodrigo Santamaría

Constructor Summary

          Builds an empty RadialCluster

          Builds an empty RadialCluster in the ClusterSet r

          Builds RadialCluster with the nodes in MaximalCluster c, and puts it in ClusterSet r

drawHulls

public void drawHulls()
Overrides Cluster.drawHulls(). Center node is not taken into account to build the wrapping hull
